Uses of Interface
edu.stanford.nlp.mt.train.WordAlignment

  • Packages that use WordAlignment 
    Package Description
    edu.stanford.nlp.mt.train
    Training routines for base generative models (e.g., phrase tables, lexical reordering models).

    • Uses of WordAlignment in edu.stanford.nlp.mt.train

      Classes in edu.stanford.nlp.mt.train that implement WordAlignment 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractWordAlignment
      Abstract class representing a set of word alignments for one sentence pair.
      class  DualWordAlignment
      Read in the "f2e" alignments, for two different alignment files.
      class  GIZAWordAlignment
      Sentence pair with GIZA word alignment, with GIZA alignment probability for each direction.
      class  SymmetricalWordAlignment
      Sentence pair with symmetrical word alignment (i.e., if e_i aligns to f_j in one direction, then f_j aligns to e_i as well in the other direction).
